textAfterTable: 11 Songs Biography Formed: 1996 in Nashville, TN Genre: Christian & Gospel Years Active: '90s, '00s Christian rockers All Star United debuted in 1997 with a self-titled LP that was the subject of much acclaim — earning a Grammy nomination as the year's best Rock/Gospel album, it launched four CCM chart-topping hits, including the aptly titled "Smash Hit."
